titleStmt.title: A vvord for the common vveale tending towards the begetting and continuing, a right vnderstanding and good opinion betweene the Parliament and the people. And towards the laying a firme foundation of constant peace and good will towards each other. / By Isaac Penington, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, Sir, 1587?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb. 15 1649"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
